org.blockchain_innovation.factom.client.api

Interface LowLevelClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FactomdClientImpl, OfflineWalletdClientImpl, WalletdClientImpl

    public interface LowLevelClient
    The lowlevel client allows you to do direct exchanges (request, responses). This allows you to add additional request/response pairs. It also gives you access to settings and executor services.

      • getSettings

        RpcSettings getSettings()
        Gets the Rpc setting for this client.
        Returns:
        Rpc Settings.

      • setSettings

        LowLevelClient setSettings(RpcSettings settings)
        Sets the Rpc settings for this client. The settings allow you to set urls, usernames, passwords etc.
        Parameters:
        settings - The Rpc settings
        Returns:
        This client

      • getUrl

        java.net.URL getUrl()
        Gets the URL this client connects to.
        Returns:
        The url of factomd/walletd.

      • setUrl

        LowLevelClient setUrl(java.net.URL url)
        Sets the URL this client connects to (factomd/walletd). Normally this is configured from settings.
        Parameters:
        url - The url of factomd/walletd.
        Returns:
        This client.

      • exchange

        <RpcResult> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<FactomResponse<RpcResult>> exchange(FactomRequest factomRequest,
                                                                                       java.lang.Class<RpcResult> rpcResultClass)
        Performs the exchange that happens when submitting a request to factomd/walletd. This returns a promise.
        Type Parameters:
        RpcResult - The type of result to expect (response).
        Parameters:
        factomRequest - The request to send
        rpcResultClass - The result class of the response.
        Returns:
        The promise for the response

      • exchange

        <RpcResult> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<FactomResponse<RpcResult>> exchange(RpcRequest.Builder rpcRequestBuilder,
                                                                                       java.lang.Class<RpcResult> rpcResultClass)
        Performs the exchange that happens when submitting a request to factomd/walletd. This returns a promise.
        Type Parameters:
        RpcResult - The type of result to expect (response).
        Parameters:
        rpcRequestBuilder - The request builder that will be build into a request to send
        rpcResultClass - The result class of the response.
        Returns:
        The promise for the response

      • exchange

        <RpcResult> java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<FactomResponse<RpcResult>> exchange(RpcRequest rpcRequest,
                                                                                       java.lang.Class<RpcResult> rpcResultClass)
        Performs the exchange that happens when submitting a request to factomd/walletd. This returns a promise. This overload leaves out the FactomRequest wrapper object, since it only has one delegate currently.
        Type Parameters:
        RpcResult - The type of result to expect (response).
        Parameters:
        rpcRequest - The Rpc request to send
        rpcResultClass - The result class of the response.
        Returns:
        The promise for the response

      • setExecutorService

        LowLevelClient setExecutorService(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService)
        Set the executor service for the async parts. Allows you to use your own executor services, or use managed executor services in a JEE environment. If not provided a default executor service will be provided.
        Parameters:
        executorService - The executor service.
        Returns:
        This client/

      • getExecutorService

        java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService getExecutorService()
        Get the executor service for the async parts. Allows you to use your own executor services, or use managed executor services in a JEE environment. If not provided a default executor service will be provided.
        Returns:
        The executor service being used.
